website_summaries.verdict: Excellent starter set of drill bits for the home handyman. Variety of bits works well for different use cases.
pros: Tip design makes starting holes easier
cons: Only 20 drill bits in the set
Bits will snap if used with hard woods

customer_reviews.title: Rounded ends = spinning in the drill head.  Go with Hex ends all the way baby!!
customer_reviews.text: What's to say. They're drill bits. They make holes. Not as sharp as I would like, but they cut through soft wood with little difficulty. I DO have some good advice though .... NEVER buy drill bits that are rounded on the ends! Go hex all the way!! It's darn near impossible to keep them from spinning in your drill no matter how hard you have them chucked down, especially when drilling into hard woods.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: If it's on sale it's great.  Otherwise, spend less money.
customer_reviews.text: My only real issue with DEWALT is the price. These are good quality, and come in a great case which must be why you'd want to spend the extra money. If you find this on sale, buy it...if not, spend a little less and get the same bits from any of the known brands. Just stay away from the obvious import garbage because of the quality of the steel.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Picture is not what you will recieve
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt dw1177 product # matches both black oxide and black and gold drill bit sets. you will receive black and gold. also it is a 17 drill bit set with three extra matching drill bit sizes. home depot sells a set just like these in a 14 bit set for 10 dollars, less than half the cost. dewalt has discontinued black oxide drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Drill Bits, Black, work well.
customer_reviews.text: Good bits, good price. They cut holes well. Not sure what else to say....I feel pressured to say more than the obvious. There drill bits. If you turn them the correct direction they will cut a hole in many materials. Turn them the wrong way, well they will nothing but aggravate you. It's not you, its the bits. You will learn very fast the correct direction to turn them. They do cut steel very well. Use cutting oil, it's a must. And little tip, if you put in a drill, it will turn them much faster than by hand. You're welcome.
customer_reviews.author: SRQamazed

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong set of drill bits, then a bit broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong set of drill bits. Ordered the black oxide and received some black and gold set. Used a bit to drill a hole in an thin aluminum lounge chair leg and the bit grabbed and snapped off. Garbage transaction and garbage drill bits, wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: These bits are truly fantastic. My first project was to drill a whole ...
customer_reviews.text: These bits are truly fantastic. My first project was to drill a whole into a 1/2" round solid steel rod to hold a clip pin. Using an 18V- cordless drill the bit never wondered around, started right in and within 60 seconds my hole was drilled., Not sure how long it will stay that sharp but wow, they are truly a metal worker's friend for a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Bagadonuts

customer_reviews.title: Well made & dependable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father-in-law for his birthday because I own the same ones and I LOVE them. I had to drill through the aluminium frame of my sliding glass doors, to replace a broken handle, and these bits made it so easy! They are sturdy, well made, and have never failed me! The case they come in is great too! No more rooting around in my tool box for a loose bit that is the right size lol!
customer_reviews.author: GoldenQueenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the bits you ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bits via prime and two days later a package showed up. The case looks almost identical, but inside were black and gold bits not black oxide. I ordered the black oxide because a coworker uses these, we are a food grade facility and drill a lot of stainless and this set is a godsend. I will update my review if/when I get the product that I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Carder

customer_reviews.title: Good bits, bad case!
customer_reviews.text: The bits look solid. Theyre really sharp and I love how they pull out and each is labeled. The box itself tho sucks. Mine wont close and latch. Bad manufacturing cut.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Amazon strikes out again.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't black and it's not a 20 piece. Kinda pissed off now. Guess I'll have to wait in line at Home Depot to get what I really want. Amazon's mistakes are starting to pile up and wear on me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Doitmaiself

customer_reviews.title: Have not used yet just looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: FYI they aren't all black no more. They're Gold and Black so if you get the new set it's the same material and such but comparing them the new ones has less twists on them. New casing, and yes it's not the wrong item because it has the same exact part number.(very small on the very top right corner on the front.)
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about drill bits, other than they either work or get dull and don't. These are brand new and work just fine. I really like the carrying case and the ease of identifying each bit. These were a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: better than the more expensive bits.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these bits for many many years with very few issues. I have used similar bits from time to time in the past and have experienced significant breakage. if these bits are used according the product design specifications and within design limits you will not need any other bits, these are quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Bit sheered in wood
customer_reviews.text: I am sure it is a manufacturing error but the 1/2 inch bit sheared when drilling through cherry, this was the first time using the bit and the first hole I made. Amazon is amazing and replaced otherwise I would not have been so pleased. Hopefully the replacement is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Won't drill steel.
customer_reviews.text: I have used half of them to drill holes in light steel from 1/16" to 1/2" and the bits MAY drill one hole but then your done. Use them for wood. I did not return them since I have used a number of them but take my word, please buy a better drill for steel.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: For home use ... perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are my second set. They do get dull, just like any drill but for home use these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kids_bus_driver

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with DeWalt
customer_reviews.text: I always buy DeWalt products, they are professional quality goods with strong craftsmanship and it's the brand the pro's trust according to the Home Depot rep I spoke to. So far I am impressed with all of my DeWalt purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Thomasian

customer_reviews.title: Dull Straight From The Box
customer_reviews.text: These bits look good, but will not drill warm butter. I usually like Dewalt tools, but these are junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! They don’t break as easily as others in the same price range!
customer_reviews.text: As expected, great quality from these manufacturers! I’ve used them hardcore on some home improvement mods and the neither one of the bits have broken so far! I’m very impressed because for the price, i’d expect something less sturdy, but I’m happy because they’re the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Lainez

customer_reviews.title: God purchase, but shame on Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: Good set, although I'm very disappointed in a company like Dewalt for allowing fake reviews on their products. I really like that it came with a few backups of the smaller bits since those are usually the first to break.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Drill Bits
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for everyday use. It comes with the basic sizes, which is great for the home DIYer. Also, the bits were very sharp right out of the package. I didnt realize how dull my old bits were until I bought this set. Will definitely buy again, but wont need to anytime soon.

customer_reviews.title: High quality bit set!
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality bit set! Definitely a good purchase, and a must have for any do-it-yourselfer with a power drill!

customer_reviews.title: Every size Dill bits
customer_reviews.text: This has every drill bit a home owner could need. Strong durable bits with good bite. Ever size I could need.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect stocking stuffer or gift for the handy man in your life. Good assortment of drill bit sizes!

customer_reviews.text: Worked well to drill out a broken exhaust header bolt. Last longer than other branded steel bits. Great case and a huge assortment of sizes.

I love the Fancy Case that they Came in. I didn't expect such a Real Fancy Case, I figured that they would come in a Different Type of Plastic Case. Kudos to DeWalt.

customer_reviews.text: These bits really work great. They start cutting easily and the thicker ones ( > 3/8ths) are very durable. However, i did break 2 of the 3/8ths while drilling through pine. It was my first project in about 6 years and maybei wasn't holding the drill straight, but as soon as i bought set of stronger 3/8ths i finished the rest of the drilling (another 100+ holes). -Great Price -Good Quality -Cuts through Metal -Drills through hard wood I Would Recommend this to everyone looking for a great starter pack of bits

customer_reviews.title: Better than you can imagine

Recently we were working on a car and he went to his go-to drill bit set which were very new and began to drill through my solid steel brake rotor. After seeing him struggle I pulled out my black-oxide set and it cut through them like butter. He couldn't believe how good these bits are. Needless to say he's getting a set for Christmas because he hasn't stopped talking about them. The price is great too!

product_meta.title: DEWALT Black Oxide Drill Bit Set, 20-Piece (DW1177)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackDEWALT DW1177 20-Piece Black-Oxide Metal Drill Bit Set

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The DEWALT DW1177 20-piece drill bit set contains bits sized from 1/16-inch up to 1/2-inch. These bits have a black oxide finish for greater wear protection and longevity of the bit. The parabolic flute design also gives these bits greater strength. They have a 135-degree split-point design that reduces slip and walking and allows for easier no-slip starting. The bit set includes a sturdy tough case container to keep bits organized. Tough cases include a sliding soft-grip lock that keeps the case closed securely to prevent lost bits. These bits are ideal for drilling in metal, wood, and plastics.
feature_bullets: The product is 20PC BLK OX Bit Set
The product is manufactured in China
Black oxide finish for greater wear protection
Parabolic flute design for greater bit strength
Includes tough case container to keep bits organized
Sliding soft-grip lock keeps case closed securely
Black oxide finish for greater wear protection
Black oxide finish for greater wear protection
Parabolic flute design for greater bit strength
135-degree split-point design reduces slip and walking
Includes tough case container to keep bits organized
Sliding soft-grip lock keeps case closed securely
